# Claude Codiac

> Compare Claude Code /insights reports and discover your coding soul compatibility. Upload two HTML exports and get personality analysis, compatibility scores, and shareable comparison cards.

## Overview

- URL: https://codiac.amditis.tech
- Author: Joe Amditis
- Type: Interactive web tool (single-page app)

## What it does

Claude Codiac analyzes Claude Code /insights reports â€” the usage analytics that Claude Code generates about your coding sessions. Users upload two reports and the tool:

1. Parses usage data (messages, tools, languages, response times, errors)
2. Assigns each user a mascot personality (Beaver, Hawk, Owl, Cheetah, Octopus, Parrot, Fox, Bear)
3. Calculates a compatibility score (0-100%)
4. Generates side-by-side analytics comparing coding patterns
5. Creates shareable comparison cards for social media

## How to use it

1. Open Claude Code and run `/insights` to generate your report
2. Export the report as HTML (Save As in your browser)
3. Visit https://codiac.amditis.tech
4. Drag and drop two HTML report files
5. View your compatibility results and share them

## Mascot personalities

Each mascot represents a coding style based on tool usage patterns, language preferences, response times, and error rates. The eight mascots are: Beaver (builder), Hawk (precision), Owl (wisdom), Cheetah (speed), Octopus (multitasker), Parrot (communicator), Fox (clever), Bear (steady).
